location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 7/27 'Muscat: supply of Vickers-Berthier Machine Rifle to Muscat State; supply of guns and ammunition to Sultan'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in rough chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.The file consists of two parts, IOR/L/PS/12/2195/1-2, comprising one folder each.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 113; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains two folders of correspondence regarding requests for weapons and ammunition made by the Sultan of Muscat (Sa'īd bin Taymūr Āl Bū Sa'īd) to the British and American Governments.The file includes dividers which give a list of correspondence references contained in each part by year. These are placed at the end of the correspondence for each part.

name.namePart: Sultan of Muscat and Oman, Āl Bū Sa'īd Dynasty
